import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Table from './components/Table/Table' import Trending from './components/Trending/Trending' const Home = () => { const globalState = useSelector(state => state.layout) return (

The global Crypto market is {globalState.globalData?.market_cap_change_percentage_24h_usd?.toFixed(2)<0 ? "down" : "up" }  

{globalState.globalData?.market_cap_change_percentage_24h_usd?.toFixed(2)}% 

in the past 24 hours

) } export default Home
